Malachi or Malachias__02.3__I will cast the shoulder to you: : I will cast away the shoulder, which in the law was appointed to be your portion, and fling it at you in my anger: and will reject both you and your festivals like dung.
Malachi or Malachias__02.13__With tears: : Viz., by occasion of your wives, whom you have put away: and who came to weep and lament before the altar.
Malachi or Malachias__02.16__Iniquity shall cover his garment: : Viz., of every man that putteth away his wife without just cause; notwithstanding that God permitted it in the law, to prevent the evil of murder.
